commit.message:
Update TEST_I_F calls in ARM fp-int-convert tests.

gcc/testsuite:
	* gcc.dg/torture/arm-fp16-int-convert-alt.c (FP16_MAX_EXP): New
	macro.
	(main): Update calls to TEST_I_F.
	* gcc.dg/torture/arm-fp16-int-convert-ieee.c (FP16_MAX_EXP): New
	macro.
	(main): Update calls to TEST_I_F.

From-SVN: r239657
